posts.name: This Site
posts.about: This site is made as a portfolio/practice, so there is information about different areas of my work (as well as photos of my cat)). I am actively learning as a junior front-end developer. At the moment, I have experience in technical support, using skills such as: bash, SQL. I also have 3d modeling skills.
